# squadcast_service (Resource)

Service resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email_prefix` (String) Email prefix.
- `escalation_policy_id` (String) Escalation policy id.
- `name` (String) Service name.
